faqData.question: Can guests take photos or videos during the ceremony?
faqData.answer:
Guests may take photos and videos during the ceremony.

We respectfully ask that these moments are not shared on social media.

A QR code will be provided for uploading your photos and videos. Thank you for your understanding.

faqData.question: What is the wedding theme and dress code?
faqData.answer:
Our wedding follows a strict dress code.

Dress Code: Strictly formal. No slippers, shorts, jeans, tshirt, or white color.

Colors: Brown, black, teal green, blue, gray, or beige only.

We kindly ask all guests to adhere to the dress code to maintain a cohesive and elegant celebration.

faqData.question: Are children allowed?
faqData.answer: While we love children, we are only able to accommodate those who are part of the entourage. We appreciate your understanding.
